dict.acceptation: 商议，商量；[医]会诊；咨询；充当顾问；

sent.orig: Consult your local broker; They had to consult before arriving at a decision.
sent.trans: 他们在作出决定之前必须要商量。

sent.orig: Specific can consult the foreign investment of phenanthrene is banned collection (FINL) .
sent.trans: 具体可参照菲的外国投资禁录(FINL)。

sent.orig: No longer able to put up with his toothache, he went to consult a dentist.
sent.trans: 他再也忍受不住牙痛，就去请牙医诊治。

sent.orig: The best advice is to consult your doctor or a dietician.
sent.trans: 最好的建议是向你的医生或营养师咨询。

sent.orig: Discontinue use and consult your doctor if skin sensitivity occurs Avoid contact with eyes.
sent.trans: 如果出现皮肤敏感现货，停止使用并就医。
